No
The direct relationship between kidney stone size and treatment is that large kidney stone causes receives treatment. The direct relationship between treatment and recovery is that treatment causes recovery. Since we already know that the patient has a large kidney stone, we can conclude that the patient will receive treatment. Then, since the patient will receive treatment, we can conclude that the patient will recover. The specific condition of the patient not having a large kidney stone is not present in this scenario, so we must consider the general rule that large kidney stone causes receives treatment, and treatment causes recovery. In this case, the patient having a large kidney stone means they will get treatment, and that treatment will lead to recovery.<|eot_id|>
